Text: Heat Rate option update Cc Harry and Steve Couple of updates on the TVA tolls Please change the gas assumption to NYMEX mmBtu this adder is a fixed cost so it should not be affected by volatility Also price the MWs for a year term starting and the MWs for a year term starting Sorry for the confusion What kind of time frame do you see for providing an indicative offer for these two products Thanks Nick Original Message From Hiemstra Nick Sent Wednesday September PM To Arora Harry Wang Steve Cc Meyn Jim Subject Heat Rate option Harry Here are the inputs for the possible options we spoke with you about Power Into TVA Gas TETCOM demand commodity see attached file for allin gas price Heat Rate mmBtukWh Variable OM mWh Minimum run hours Run hours x Term Size MW MW Please give us an indicative price We have also priced this option using our spread option model Let me know if you have any questions or need more inputs Nick

Re Flag Football Tourneylast I heard was that each of the Enron teams from each school would play each other on a weekday night or something I had heard this Wed for the two AM teams Then we might have the two Enron winners play each other with the winner possibly playing the Andersen winner if they decide to play Thats the latest Ive heard though Webb Jennings was supposed to be calling Simmons about the rescheduling Enron North America Corp From Eric Bass AM To Nick CT cc Subject Flag Football Tourney Have you heard anything about the reschedule date

Curves and scalars Cc Mike When you evaluate your curves and scalars for the OGE area can you also make sure your Entergy long term curves and scalars are in good shape We will probably be using those for some load following possibilities and other long term deals such as heat rate options in the Entergy control area I assume the scalars would not be much different for either area but I wanted to make sure they were both updated Thanks Nick

Midway gas supply Cc The email below changes things for years because we would need to have gas for the summer months Charlie please proceed with getting the pricing as we talked about but also try to get pricing for more of a firm service instead of best efforts for Summer and What is the gas availability outlook for this time period Thanks nh Forwarded by Nick HiemstraHOUECT on AM Fred Mitro AM To Nick CT cc Subject Midway gas supply Nick I wanted to check with you on one issue on the Midway pricing request currently at the desk The interruptible provision should be for the following profile Years hours per year Years hours per year This is the profile of allowed oil backup operation under the projects air permit Is this profile consistent with the pricing request we discussed with Charlie yesterday afternoon Let me know I wanted to check this before they give us pricing back Fred

PoinsettiasThe Bayou City Dance Company is once again selling poinsettias as a fundraiser This is the dance company for year olds for which my wife April is the Director They are selling the poinsettias for each and they are pretty good size about inches tall from what I remember Just like last year I will deliver the flowers to the Enron building or at least to the Enron garage They come in red white or pink but I think the red were by far the healthiest and longest lasting The order are due by next Friday so please let me know if you would like to order and how many Thanks Nick

Requests etc Cc Stacey In talking with the Estate team it sounds like they will be needing a few different types of info to help in the unwinding process In addition to the MTM reports you guys have been putting together could we also do a delta position report by month Also it would be helpful to get a list of deal specs and terms for each counterparty basically like we were working on for David Forster before the bankruptcy Ill check with Kim Theriot on this as she was putting the list together before but we will also want to get a MTM breakdown by deal for each counterparty These requests are not super urgent Basically Id like to get the breakdowns sometime in the next week or two Hope that is OK as I know you guys are inundated with requests at this time Let me know if you have any questions or if this overlaps with any other requests Thanks Nick
